recordLookups.description: This is the record lookup to search SFDC for an existing account
recordLookups.name: Look_for_Account_in_System
recordLookups.label: Look for Account in System

fields.name: AccountExistsTitle
fields.fieldText: It appears that this account already exists in Salesforce.

fields.name: DT
fields.fieldText: Check the dropdown to get details on the existing account.

fields.name: DT7
fields.fieldText: Click finish to exit.

fields.name: LookupAcct
fields.fieldText: Tell us about your new account.

validationRule.errorMessage:
Account Name cannot be greater than 40 characters.
Use abbreviations if needed (i.e.: Incorporated – Inc., Corporation - Corp., Limited Company – Ltd, Limited Liability Corp. - LLC.)
US phone numbers should be in this format: (999) 999-9999.

Billing Street cannot be greater than 60 characters.
Use abbreviations if needed.
Examples: Avenue – Ave. Apartment – Apt. Boulevard – Blvd. Building – Bldg. Court – Ct. Department – Dept. Drive – Dr. Highway – Hwy. Parkway – Pkwy. Road – Rd.
Please use the two-character abbreviation for the state. ex. IL
Zip/Postal Codes must be in the following format 99999 or 99999-9999

fields.name: Does_this_Account_belong_to_a_Parent_Account
fields.fieldText: Does this Account belong to a Parent Account?

fields.name: IndustrySegmentScreen
fields.fieldText:
You chose {!Business_Sector} as your business sector.
Please choose the proper segment.
